analysis.key_quote: The undermining of the nonpartisan civil service is a great disservice to the American public - particularly as it will rid civil service of many long-term employees who have so much knowledge and experience of the running of our country.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the loss of experienced employees, and the erosion of public trust in government, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
